front.title: Linkset: A Link Relation Type for Link Sets

abstract.t: This specification defines the "linkset" relation type that can be used to link to a resource that provides a set of links. Note to Readers Please discuss this draft on the ART mailing list (<https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/art>). Online access to all versions and files is available on GitHub (<https://github.com/dret/I-D/tree/master/linkset-link-rel>).
